A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you've watched the originals\, but have not seen this sequal\, try to keep it that way. This movie lacks subtlety\, patience\, and peace. Moreover\, climatic scenes are mediocre recreations of the classic scenes we all fell in love with from the originals. I wanted to like this movie\, but Rian Johnson\, you could have done so much better...
